languages.text: {n}Эмелина взирает на тело дознавателя без особых эмоций на лице, лишь едва поджав губы. Затем савант переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Полагаю, у меня не остается особого выбора, кроме как стать вашей... заложницей? Агентом? Лишняя семантика. Ответьте — что вы сделаете с выжившими с Фтона-IV?"

{n}As Emelina stares at the Interrogator's body, her face reveals no particular emotion save for a tightening around her mouth. Then the Sage looks at you.{/n} "I presume I have no choice but to become your... hostage? Agent? The semantics are unimportant. Answer the question — what will you do with the survivors of Phton IV?"
languages.original_text: {n}Эмелина взирает на тело дознавателя без особых эмоций на лице, лишь едва поджав губы. Затем савант переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Полагаю, у меня не остается особого выбора, кроме как стать вашей... заложницей? Агентом? Лишняя семантика. Ответьте — что вы сделаете с выжившими с Фтона-IV?"

languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜凝视着审讯官的尸体，嘴角微微上扬。除此之外，她并没有露出任何特别的表情。随后，艾米莉娜看着你。{/n}“我猜我别无选择，只能成为你的……人质？代理人？至于用哪个词，这并不重要。回答我的问题吧，你打算如何处置菲顿四号星的幸存者？”
languages.original_text: {n}As Emelina stares at the Interrogator's body, her face reveals no particular emotion save for a tightening around her mouth. Then the Sage looks at you.{/n} "I presume I have no choice but to become your... hostage? Agent? The semantics are unimportant. Answer the question — what will you do with the survivors of Phton IV?"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜凝视着审讯官的尸体，嘴角微微上扬。除此之外，她并没有露出任何特别的表情。随后，艾米莉娜看着你。{/n}“我猜我别无选择，只能成为你的……人质？代理人？至于用哪个词，这并不重要。回答我的问题吧，你打算如何处置菲顿四号星的幸存者？”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Cuando Emelina observa el cuerpo del interrogador, su rostro no expresa ninguna emoción en particular salvo por sus labios apretados. Después, la sabia te mira.{/n} «Entiendo que no tengo más elección que convertirme en su... ¿prisionera? ¿Agente? La palabra no importa. Responda a la pregunta: ¿qué hará con los supervivientes de Phton IV?».
languages.original_text: {n}As Emelina stares at the Interrogator's body, her face reveals no particular emotion save for a tightening around her mouth. Then the Sage looks at you.{/n} "I presume I have no choice but to become your... hostage? Agent? The semantics are unimportant. Answer the question — what will you do with the survivors of Phton IV?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando Emelina observa el cuerpo del interrogador, su rostro no expresa ninguna emoción en particular salvo por sus labios apretados. Después, la sabia te mira.{/n} «Entiendo que no tengo más elección que convertirme en su... ¿prisionera? ¿Agente? La palabra no importa. Responda a la pregunta: ¿qué hará con los supervivientes de Phton IV?».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}エメリナはインテロゲイターの遺体を見つめている。その顔は、口のあたりが強張っている以外は特に感情が表れていない。そして賢者はあなたを見た。{/n}「私には…選択肢はないと思います。人質ですか？エージェントですか？意味論は重要ではありません。質問に答えてください。プトン・IVの生存者をどうしますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}As Emelina stares at the Interrogator's body, her face reveals no particular emotion save for a tightening around her mouth. Then the Sage looks at you.{/n} "I presume I have no choice but to become your... hostage? Agent? The semantics are unimportant. Answer the question — what will you do with the survivors of Phton IV?"

traits.locale_text: {n}エメリナはインテロゲイターの遺体を見つめている。その顔は、口のあたりが強張っている以外は特に感情が表れていない。そして賢者はあなたを見た。{/n}「私には…選択肢はないと思います。人質ですか？エージェントですか？意味論は重要ではありません。質問に答えてください。プトン・IVの生存者をどうしますか？」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Aucune émotion ne se lit sur le visage d'Emelina tandis qu'elle regarde le cadavre de l'interrogateur, à l'exception de ses lèvres qui se resserrent légèrement. Au bout de quelques instants, elle se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'imagine que je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de devenir votre... otage ? Agent ? La sémantique importe peu. Répondez à la question : que comptez-vous faire des survivants de Phton-IV ? »
languages.original_text: {n}As Emelina stares at the Interrogator's body, her face reveals no particular emotion save for a tightening around her mouth. Then the Sage looks at you.{/n} "I presume I have no choice but to become your... hostage? Agent? The semantics are unimportant. Answer the question — what will you do with the survivors of Phton IV?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Aucune émotion ne se lit sur le visage d'Emelina tandis qu'elle regarde le cadavre de l'interrogateur, à l'exception de ses lèvres qui se resserrent légèrement. Au bout de quelques instants, elle se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'imagine que je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de devenir votre... otage ? Agent ? La sémantique importe peu. Répondez à la question : que comptez-vous faire des survivants de Phton-IV ? »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Als Emelina die Leiche des Interrogators anstarrt, zeigt ihr Gesicht keine Regung, nur die Mundwinkel sind ein wenig angespannt. Dann blickt die Weise dich an.{/n} "Dann habe ich wohl keine Wahl und bin nun Eure ... Geisel? Agentin? Die Semantik spielt keine Rolle. Beantwortet mir eine Frage – was wird aus den Überlebenden von Phton IV?"
languages.original_text: {n}As Emelina stares at the Interrogator's body, her face reveals no particular emotion save for a tightening around her mouth. Then the Sage looks at you.{/n} "I presume I have no choice but to become your... hostage? Agent? The semantics are unimportant. Answer the question — what will you do with the survivors of Phton IV?"

Dann blickt die Weise dich an.{/n} "Dann habe ich wohl keine Wahl und bin nun Eure ... Geisel? Agentin? Die Semantik spielt keine Rolle. Beantwortet mir eine Frage – was wird aus den Überlebenden von Phton IV?"

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu'nun cesedine bakan Emelina, dudaklarını sık sıkı kapatıp boş bir surat ifadesi sergiliyor. Âlim, ardından sana dönüyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum... Tutsağın olmak veya Ajan olarak hizmetine girmekten başka seçeneğim yok?.. Nasıl yorumlandığının önemi yok. Soruma yanıt ver: Phton IV'teki sağ kalanlara ne yapacaksın?"
languages.original_text: {n}As Emelina stares at the Interrogator's body, her face reveals no particular emotion save for a tightening around her mouth. Then the Sage looks at you.{/n} "I presume I have no choice but to become your... hostage? Agent? The semantics are unimportant. Answer the question — what will you do with the survivors of Phton IV?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu'nun cesedine bakan Emelina'nın yüzünde, sıkı sıkı kapanmış dudakları haricinde belirgin bir duygu okunmuyor. Âlim ardından sana dönüyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum senin... Tutsağın olmak haricinde bir seçeneğim yok? Ajanın veya? Nasıl yorumlandığının önemi yok. Soruma yanıt ver: Phton IV'te hayatta kalanlar konusunda ne yapacaksın?"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
